meanings.definition: A raised molding on a door or panel.
meanings.sent1: The bolection on the door added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully crafted the bolection to enhance the door's design.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the bolection on the door, thinking it was a ladder.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bolection, standing out among the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The bolection on the panel was so intricate, it seemed to come to life.

meanings.sent1: The bolection in the building's design highlighted its unique style.
meanings.sent2: Architects often use bolection to add character to their structures.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the bolection was a secret passage in the house.
meanings.sent4: The bolection of the building reached towards the sky, as if trying to touch the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The bolection stood out against the plain walls, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The intricate bolection on the cabinet made it a work of art.
meanings.sent2: Craftsmen take pride in creating unique bolection for their furniture.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the bolection for a nut and tried to bury it in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, bouncing off the bolection like music.
meanings.sent5: The bolection on the chair was so smooth, it felt like touching silk.
